entry.def: A thousand or one thousand is the number 1,000.

example.ex: Visitors can expect to pay about a thousand pounds a day.
example.tran: 游客每天大概要支付 1,000 英镑。

entry.def: If you refer to thousands of things or people, you are emphasizing that there are very many of them.

example.ex: Thousands of refugees are packed into overcrowded towns and villages...
example.tran: 成千上万的难民涌入拥挤不堪的城镇和村庄。

example.ex: I must have driven past that place thousands of times.
example.tran: 我得有上千次开车经过那里。

1. denoting a quantity consisting of 1,000 items or units

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English thūsend, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch duizend and German Tausend

sentences.cn: 一千的百分之十是一百.
sentences.en: Ten percent of one thousand is one hundred.

sentences.cn: 成千的科学家已加入研究干细胞的研究团队.
sentences.en: Thousands of scientists have joined the research team work on cell study.

sentences.cn: 例如, 成千的麦哲伦海峡企鹅在阿根廷的Runtatombo搭窝.
sentences.en: For example, thousands of Magellanic penguins build their nests at Punta Tombo, Argentina.

sentences.cn: 在每个新的杂交种向群众推广以前,要对成千的杂交组合做试验.
sentences.en: Many thousands of combinations must be tested for each new hybrid variety released to the public.

sentences.cn: 这些企鹅都被原油覆盖, 但是成千的居民帮助清洗治疗这些企鹅.
sentences.en: The penguins became covered with oil. But thousands of people helped clean and treat the birds.

sentences.cn: 那家工厂一倒闭,成千的工人都失业了.
sentences.en: Thousands of workers lost their jobs when the factory closed.

sentences.cn: 就其组织来看, 所有这些系统都集许多 ( 成千的 ) 自主自发的成员成一家.
sentences.en: Organizationally, each of these is a collection of many ( thousands ) of autonomous members.

sentences.cn: 殖民者惨绝人寰地屠杀了成千的土著居民.
sentences.en: The colonists massacred thousands of natives with brutal and callous force.

sentences.cn: 成千的人流亡了, 一些人完全失去他们的家庭,数不清的年轻人见证了暴力和血腥的场面.
sentences.en: Thousands were displaced, some lost their homes altogether and countless youngsters witnessed violent and bloody scenes.

sentences.cn: 为什么全世界成千的业余天文爱好者没有对行星x拉响警报 呢 ?
sentences.en: Why are the thousands of amateur astronomers around the world not alarm bells about Planet X?

sentences.cn: 那个时候只有成千的学者有机会进入高等教育系统.
sentences.en: That then just thousands had accessed to higher education.

sentences.cn: 由于缺乏最基本的医疗设备,成千的人变瞎了.
sentences.en: Thousands of people go blind due to a lack of even the most basic medical facilities.

sentences.cn: 在我们出发度假前,我还有许许多多的事情要做.
sentences.en: I have a thousand and one things to do before we set out for our holiday.

sentences.cn: 蒙大纳州景色优美,每年都吸引了许许多多的游客.
sentences.en: The splendor of Montana casts a spell on hundreds of thousands of tourists every year.

sentences.cn: 一个忠诚的朋友抵得上许许多多的亲戚.
sentences.en: One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.

sentences.cn: 在我们动身去度假之前,我还有许许多多的事情要做.
sentences.en: We have thousand and one things to do before we set out for our holiday.

Sentence.sentence: It has a history of over two thousand years.
Thousands of bees left a town after landing on the back of a car when their queen got stuck in its boot.
If you could get the right ten thousand people to move from Silicon Valley to Buffalo,  Buffalo would become Silicon Valley.
Fifty years ago, they were the latest thing in educational reform: big, modern, suburban high schools with students counted in the thousands.

And most noticeable of all, there is the phenomenon of large urban and suburban high schools that have split up into smaller units of a few hundred, generally housed in the same grounds that once boasted thousands of students all marching to the same band.
If you could get the right ten thousand people to move from silicon Valley to Buffalo, Buffalo would become Silicon Valley.
Sentence.come: 2015年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: So we work very closely with a great group of volunteers called the One Thousand Elders.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section C
